EmailTemplate.description: Contact owner and partner contact should receive a notification one week before it expires and then again on the day that it expires
EmailTemplate.name: 7B. Partner Opportunity Expiration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Opportunity Registration has Expired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Partner_Contact__c},
Your Opportunity registration for {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c} and {!Opportunity.Account} has expired due to lack of activity updates.
If you are continuing to pursue this prospect, please register an opportunity.
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
